name: Bobby2552.GitHub.io
body:
### Introduction

**H**ello there!! My name is Ben Scholer. I am a Senior in High School, planning to study Computer Science in college. I'm very interested in making hardware and software work together, and I find building both of them very fun and interesting, whether it be making an RC Car drive itself, or designing a system allowing you to control your lights from your phone. As Hannah Montana once said, "You get the best of both worlds." If you would like to contact me, all that is below.

### Contact Me
Email: <benscholer3248511@gmail.com>
Instagram: Bobby2552

### Closing
Have a great day!!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
